Instructions for Arduino Pro Mini

Support for Arduino has been provided to make it easier for the community to make contributions.
Arduino is a very accessible toolset.

  1. Connect your Arduino Pro Mini device to a USB port via a serial programmer cable.
  2. The programming options for Arduino can be modified in the menu option
    "Settings > Board Configurations"
  3. Select the “Verify Device” option from the “Actions” menu.
  4. KADE Loader will automatically determine the port which your device is
    connected and you should see confirmation of the port number and
    confirmation that the device has been detected and ready for firmware
    to be loaded.
  5. Select a firmware from the list of those available.
  6. Click the “Load Selected Firmware” button.
    The firmware should be updated in a few seconds.
  7. Unplug device. It is now ready to be used as an encoder.
